name: Thunderbolt Futsal lado
description: Thunderbolt Futsal is a premier futsal center in the Lalitpur area with top-notch facilities and friendly staff to make your experience enjoyable and memorable.

name: Momentum Futsal
description: Momentum Futsal offers a great playing environment with high-quality futsal pitches and competitive pricing, making it the go-to spot for futsal enthusiasts in Kathmandu.

name: Fusion Futsal
description: Fusion Futsal is the perfect blend of quality and affordability, offering top-class facilities at reasonable rates. Located in the heart of Bhaktapur, it's easily accessible to anyone looking for a great futsal experience.

name: Skyline Futsal
description: Skyline Futsal is a top-tier futsal center located in the heart of Kathmandu. With state-of-the-art facilities and excellent customer service, it's the perfect place for any football enthusiast to enjoy the beautiful game.

name: Nakhipot Futsal
description: Nakhipot Futsal is a top-tier futsal center located in the heart of Kathmandu. With state-of-the-art facilities and excellent customer service, it's the perfect place for any football enthusiast to enjoy the beautiful game.
